front.title: Problem Statement with Aggregate Header Limit for IPv6

abstract.t: This document first proposes introduces the concept "Aggregate header limit for IPv6"(AHL-IPv6) based on RFC8883 to indicate the total header size that a router is able to process at full forwarding rate for IPv6 packets. Then this document describes the problems for path calculation and function enablement without the awareness of AHL- IPv6, and the considerations for AHL-IPv6 collection are also included.
